conbody.p: After running the test suite, navigate to the Result tab. You can see a list of test cases. A recorded video is attached to each test case accordingly.
Click on the Play icon in the Video column to play the video or navigate to the video folder and use any available video player.

image.alt: KS test suite result video column

conbody.p: Each test step in a video has a description embedded like a subtitle.
